original_text: Then God said to Noah, ‘The rainbow will show you that I will certainly keep my promise. I will keep my covenant that is between me and everything that lives on the earth.’
korean_text: 하나님이 노아에게 또 이르시되 내가 나와 땅에 있는 모든 생물 사이에 세운 언약의 증거가 이것이라 하셨더라

sentences.original_text: that I will certainly keep my promise
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 반드시 나의 약속을 지킬 것이라는 것을

sentences.original_text: that is between me and everything
